name: Jose murcia
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Hi my name is luis I want a job were I can develop as a professional and take it with me on the future.

My interests in what type of jobs I want are the jobs that fall in this categories retail/wholesale and retail/food/hospitality and sales jobs.

experience: jobs i had were getting more experience learning new things getting everything done beyond basic and high job expectations without being told. My first job i had i got a award employer of the month and my second job i had i got promoted to a different department for performing a good customer service. I still have more goals to accomplish on my future hopefully the next job i have i accomplish more and experience more and get more skills.
